8 Muses reminds me of that nerd who does weird shit, but is so excellent that you happily play along. 8Muses has an incredible and big comic selection that includes not just hentai, but western-style comics, webcomics, CGI, and a lot more.

8Muses.com is all about the studio. Rather than giving you galleries of individual comics, all the browsing is grouped by popular brands such as Fakku, Jab, TG, and more. If you’re into the webcomic porn space, these names should all ring a bell.

This type of browsing has its pros and cons. The advantage is that once you find a comic you love, you can easily find a lot more with the same style. Different studios are good at different things, so you’re sure to develop a taste for a specific artist.

On the other hand, this means that the only way to search individual comics is through the search system. I didn’t find any way to sort the comics through categories like roleplayed taboo, etc., like you usually would on other porn sites.

Even though it was weird, I didn’t mind browsing via studio that much. You can quickly get a sense of the studio’s art style and angle, and everything is so high quality. All the different series also usually have their own common theme, like taboo. JAB Comix are some seriously awesome shit, whether you have your dick out or not.

8muses has some other features in addition to the comics. It has a pretty lovely fakes gallery with bitches, including Ariana Grande, Megan Fox, and Emma Watson. No gifs or videos here, but animated fakes are pretty bad anyway.

Speaking of which, if you haven’t checked out deepfakes, you should.

8muses also released their own porn comic, which is fucking hilarious. It’s about a kid who fucks his big-tittied teacher. Typical, but it works.

8muses is also light on the ads. You won’t find any popups or annoying bullshit here. All the comics are easily accessible, and the worst you’ll get are some banner ads on the side that are easy to ignore. By now, your brain should have adjusted to ignore banner ads.

An extensive gallery with minimal ads is always a recipe for success.

Searching via Studio

No matter how you browse the site, everything is done via franchise or studio. Whether you browse by view count, likes, or date, it doesn’t seem to matter since all the videos are grouped into studios that all feature tons of comics.

The general idea is that first you pick a studio, and then you choose a comic from within that studio. So let’s say you click on Milftoon Comics. Then you’ll be sent to the Milftoon page, where you can choose an individual series such as Lemonade or Gumass.

Once you click on individual series, then you’ll be sent to a library of all the issues under that series. So for Lemonade Issue 1, I have to click Milftoons -> Lemonade -> Lemonade Issue 1. Yes, it does feel like a lot of clicks.

Once you finally make it to the comics page, you’ll get a gallery of all the pages. Clicking on any of the pages will maximize the image for you. You can save the pictures if you want, but no bulk download option.

Sometimes the page can be too big for you to read the text, even on a full window. If you want to zoom in, click on the “Image Full Size” button on the top left. This feature will expand the image entirely, essentially letting you zoom in and out.

Browsing has its issues. Typically, you’ll want to use the search bar. All the porn at 8muses comes with a set of tags, making it easy to search for all kinds of shit.

The “More Content” option on the left lets you check out fake celebrity pics as well. The gallery is organized by the celebrity and includes all the major bitches such as Megan Fox, Victoria Justice, etc. These are all fakes, so you won’t find any GIFs, or videos.

8muses also has a pretty active forum. The discussion mostly revolves around new releases that users will post and share. You can also ask for some weirder shit, and someone will help you out. I saw a user reach out asking for dolphin porn, so yes, there are people with worse porn habits than you.

There are other languages supported too. Just search by a language, and if you’re lucky, you’ll find some translated shit. Portuguese and Spanish are sure bets to find some hot ass poon.

8muses also has their own webcomic, which is shown in both English and Russian. It’s called 8muses, and it’s pretty ass (both literally and figuratively), but it’s cool that they actually paid to get this type of shit done. Well, maybe it’s fan-made, but it shows me these guys have a real love for porn.

What I Like

There are so many different styles of porn here that you’re sure to find something you like. You’ll even find comics made up of real porn screenshots, where people just fill in text bubbles. There’s a ton for your dick to work with, generally speaking.

There’s some good Rule 34 here too. In addition to anime shit, including Pokemon and Naruto, there are also lots of random western porn like Danny Phantom, Disney’s Frozen, the Simpsons, and a more. I never watched Frozen, but after checking these bitches out, I think I get what all the hype is about.

Pure icy pussy perfection. Let it go, indeed.

What I Hate

First, the studio-based layout can be annoying. It forces you to click so many times, and it makes it hard to sample a lot of different comics at once.

8muses also doesn’t have a list view format for reading. You’ll always need to click and read each page individually. This gets doubly annoying when you have to click on “expand to full size” each time to clearly read the text.

The celebrity fakes gallery is also fucking random and doesn’t really fit in. I guess the content is pretty good, but it just reminded me of my porn habits from ten years ago. It seems like an ill-fit.

Suggestions

I also hope 8muses can provide downloads. You can download the images one by one, but I couldn’t find any way to download ZIP or PDF files for the comics.

The layout could also use some touching up. I already complained enough about how everything’s categorized by the studio, but 8muses also lacks some attention to details.

For example, the actual comics page is super bare bones. You don’t get anything except just a raw gallery of the pages.

Where are the tags? Well, to read the tags, you actually have to go into a specific page. Then randomly, a list of tags will show up on the left side. It’s fucking weird that this is the only place I seem to see the tag descriptions for each comic.

A library worthy of Alexandria

On the other hand, 8muses can also feel empty. There isn’t much beyond the content, and it’s weird that a site this good doesn’t try to make some noise on Discord or social media.

The forum is pretty solid, with thousands of users posting their own offerings in an easy to browse way. You’ll find some cool shit like original art, and amateur comics, and the admins seem active as well. As long as 8muses stays this clean, the community should grow.

One red flag I had about 8muses is that the Recently Updated section is completely empty. It just says, “there were no updates in the last 7 days”, and the way the site is organized makes it hard to find out which comics are the latest and greatest. There also is no scheduled release calendar.

8muses is still a great place for comics. If you want to see why porn webcomics have been exploding in popularity in the last few years, this is where you want to start together with MultPorn.
